sn35.16:4.3: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.16:4.6: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.16:4.9: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35.16:4.16: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.16:4.19: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35.16:4.22: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35.16:5.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ … pe …
sn35.16:5.4: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
